verses.verse: <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

<S%H3588>If<s%> you <S%H7069>buy<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he shall <S%H5647>serve:<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H2670>free<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> in by <S%H1610>himself,<s%> he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by <S%H1610>himself:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he were <S%H1166>married,<s%> <S%H802><s%> then his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out with him.

<S%H518>If<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> him a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> shall be her <S%H113>master's,<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by <S%H1610>himself.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H559>plainly<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> my <S%H802>wife,<s%> and my <S%H1121>children;<s%> I will not <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H2670>free:<s%>

Then his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to the <S%H430>judges;<s%> he shall also <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to the <S%H1817>door,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H4201>door<s%> <S%H4201>post;<s%> and his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H7527>bore<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> through with an <S%H4836>awl;<s%> and he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to be a <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> she shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out as the <S%H5650>menservants<s%> <S%H3318>do.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> she <S%H7451>please<s%> <S%H5869><s%> not her <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H3259>betrothed<s%> her to himself, then shall he let her be <S%H6299>redeemed:<s%> to <S%H4376>sell<s%> her to a <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H5971>nation<s%> he shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4910>power,<s%> seeing he has dealt <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> with her.
And <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H3259>betrothed<s%> her to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with her after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H3947>take<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> wife; her <S%H7607>food,<s%> her <S%H3682>raiment,<s%> and her duty of <S%H5772>marriage,<s%> shall he not <S%H1639>diminish.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> to her, then shall she <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H2600>free<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%>
He that <S%H5221>smites<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a man <S%H6658>lie<s%> not in <S%H6658>wait,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H579>deliver<s%> him into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> then I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> you a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he shall <S%H5127>flee.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> come <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> on his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> him with <S%H6195>guile;<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> him from my <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And he that <S%H5221>smites<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> or his <S%H517>mother,<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And he that <S%H1589>steals<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> him, or if he be <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And he that <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> or his <S%H517>mother,<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%> together, and one <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%> with a <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with his <S%H106>fist,<s%> and he <S%H4191>die<s%> not, but <S%H5307>keeps<s%> his <S%H4904>bed:<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H6965>rise<s%> again, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> on his <S%H4938>staff,<s%> then shall he that <S%H5221>smote<s%> him be <S%H5352>quit:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> he shall <S%H5414>pay<s%> for the <S%H7674>loss<s%> of his <S%H7674>time,<s%> and shall cause him to be <S%H7495>thoroughly<s%> <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H519>maid,<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and he <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> he shall be surely <S%H5358>punished.<s%>
<S%H389>Notwithstanding,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5975>continue<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> two, he shall not be <S%H5358>punished:<s%> for he is his <S%H3701>money.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5327>strive,<s%> and <S%H5062>hurt<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> with <S%H2030>child,<s%> so that her <S%H3206>fruit<s%> <S%H3318>depart<s%> from her, and yet <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H1961>follow:<s%> he shall be surely <S%H6064>punished,<s%> according as the <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H1167>husband<s%> will <S%H7896>lay<s%> on him; and he shall <S%H5414>pay<s%> as the <S%H6414>judges<s%> determine.
And <S%H518>if<s%> any <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H1961>follow,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life,<s%>
<S%H5869>Eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot,<s%>
<S%H3555>Burning<s%> for <S%H3555>burning,<s%> <S%H6482>wound<s%> for <S%H6482>wound,<s%> <S%H2250>stripe<s%> for <S%H2250>stripe.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of his <S%H519>maid,<s%> that it <S%H7843>perish;<s%> he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> for his <S%H5869>eye's<s%> <S%H8478>sake.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5307>smite<s%> out his <S%H5650>manservant's<s%> <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H519>maidservant's<s%> <S%H8127>tooth;<s%> he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> for his <S%H8127>tooth's<s%> <S%H8478>sake.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5055>gore<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman,<s%> that they <S%H4191>die:<s%> then the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be surely <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall not be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> but the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5355>quit.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> were <S%H5056>wont<s%> to <S%H5056>push<s%> with his <S%H5056>horn<s%> in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> and it has been <S%H5749>testified<s%> to his <S%H1167>owner,<s%> and he has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> him in, but that he has <S%H4191>killed<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman;<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and his <S%H1167>owner<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> there be <S%H7896>laid<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> him a <S%H3724>sum<s%> of money, then he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> for the <S%H6306>ransom<s%> of his <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H7896>laid<s%> on him.

<S%H176>Whether<s%> he have <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> have <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall <S%H5055>push<s%> a <S%H5650>manservant<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H519>maidservant;<s%> he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to their <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> a <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H953>pit,<s%> and not <S%H3680>cover<s%> it, and an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> an <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8033>therein;<s%>

The <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good,<s%> and <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of them; and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> beast shall be his.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> one <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5062>hurt<s%> <S%H7453>another's,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die;<s%> then they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of it; and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> ox <S%H1571>also<s%> they shall <S%H2673>divide.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> if it be <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H7794>ox<s%> has used to <S%H5056>push<s%> in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> and his <S%H1167>owner<s%> has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> him in; he shall surely <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> for <S%H7794>ox;<s%> and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall be his own.
